entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bas Caraquet 09:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: E 21 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Blowing snow late this morning and early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this morning then to 70 gusting to 100 early this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 6.
